Name: Rclone
Overview: Docker for Rclone - a command line program to sync files and directories to and from various cloud services.

Sync Destination.Name: Sync Destination
Sync Destination.Description: The destination that the data should be backed up to (must be the same name as specified in .rclone.conf)

Sync Destination Subpath.Name: Sync Destination Subpath
Sync Destination Subpath.Description: If the data should be backed up to a subpath on the destionation (will automaticly be created if it does not exist)

Cron Schedule.Name: Cron Schedule
Cron Schedule.Description: A custom cron schedule which will override the default value of: 0 * * * * (hourly)

Sync Command.Name: Sync Command
Sync Command.Description: A custom rclone command which will override the default value of: rclone sync /data $SYNC_DESTINATION:/$SYNC_DESTINATION_SUBPATH

Config Path.Name: Config Path
Config Path.Description: The path to where the .rclone.conf file is

Data Path.Name: Data Path
Data Path.Description: The path to the data which should be backed up by Rclone
